name: SpaceFlightNewsApp
shortDescription: SpaceFlightNewsApp which is launched under the name of 'Space Dawn' on Playstore is an Android App which is made for Space Geeks (Like me). It  provides the latest news about Space Flight from around the world. A user can also set reminders for the upcoming Rocket Launches and search for favorite topics about Space Flight.
longDescription: SpaceFlightNewsApp which is launched under the name of 'Space Dawn' on Playstore is an Android App which is made for Space Geeks (Like me). It  provides the latest news about Space Flight from around the world. A user can also set reminders for the upcoming Rocket Launches and search for favorite topics about Space Flight.
